name: Vapor

name: TapEngage
one_liner: Tablet ad network, acquired by Dropbox in July 2012

name: Perfect Audience
long_description: Perfect Audience is a retargeting platform that lets businesses bring back lost customers and get more sales effortlessly.
one_liner: Self-service display advertising for SaaS and online retail.

name: Earbits
long_description: Google AdWords for music. Allowing bands and labels to bid for airtime and have their music streamed to qualified audience.
one_liner: Google AdWords for music.  Allowing bands and labels to bid for…

name: AdGrok
long_description: AdGrok allows business owners to automate the process of choosing and bidding on keywords on Google AdWords.
one_liner: Easy SEM software. Acquired by Twitter in 2011.

name: Heyzap
long_description:
Heyzap is a premier mobile ad network that helps millions of users discover apps they love. Heyzap’s SDK for Android and iOS apps allows both well-established app producers and innovative indie developers to monetize and bring their apps to a wide audience. It currently provides advertising, publishing, mediation, and cross-promotion services to mobile developers worldwide.

Heyzap is based in San Francisco and was founded in 2009 by Jude Gomila and Immad Akhund.
one_liner: Heyzap (acquired by Fyber for $45m in 2016) is one of the largest…

name: LeanMarket
long_description: LeanMarket discovers the highest performing placements of advertising that allows users to build an ideal campaign based off in-depth reporting.
one_liner: Mobile advertising

name: OmniVirt
long_description:
OmniVirt is 360° Virtual Reality advertising platform for brands and publishers. Audiences can view 360° content with just one tap of their fingertip on smartphones, tablets and websites. No app installation or VR headset required. HTML5 / VAST complaint.

Our company is specialize in mobile formats, the network optimizes revenue for publishers and serves billions of ad impressions in more than 200 countries.
one_liner: OmniVirt is the leading VR Advertising platform for brands and…

name: Mth Sense
long_description: mth sense focuses on finding solutions to "blind" ads. mth sense offers its users an audience library to target certain demographics and psychographics.
one_liner: We're a mobile on-device profiling and ad-serving platform initially…

name: Credictive
one_liner: Attribution metatags for online content.

name: Virool
long_description:
A LITTLE ABOUT VIROOL

Virool is a video distribution platform for brand marketers that leverages programmatic technology to reach key influencers, making content more engaging and the ability to share easier than ever. Having served more than 75,000 global campaigns, Virool’s robust ActivView product suite and in-article native unit, deliver fully transparent and insightful analytics that offers viewability guarantees, emotional resonance and fraud protection. Within our platform, users can leverage a proprietary DMP of 450MM unique profiles to build custom, addressable audience segments across all screens. More than 100,000 multi-channel sites have activated video content from Virool via partnerships including Rubicon Project and direct native placements. Founded in 2012, Virool has raised $18.62M in funding from a collection of top VC firms and angel investors, including $6.62M in its seed round. It is the biggest seed investment that anymore Y-Combinator graduate has ever received.
one_liner: Virool provides native video advertising experience for the biggest…

name: URX
long_description: URX empowers publishers to monetize mobile content and enables advertisers to drive mobile commerce. The world's most forward-thinking companies use URX to connect users directly to relevant commerce experiences. URX is headquartered in San Francisco and has raised $15M from Accel, Google Ventures, First Round Capital, SV Angel and Y Combinator.
one_liner: Mobile ads that users like. Acquired by Pinterest in May 2016.

name: Boostable
long_description: Boostable makes advertising easy for sellers and brands on marketplaces. We grow marketplaces by helping their sellers advertise their listings and gather insights. Boostable is a YCombinator company based in San Francisco and funded by SVAngel, 500 Startups and others.
one_liner: Advertising platform tools for marketplace sellers.

name: Motionlead
long_description: Motionlead empowers advertisers and publishers to reach their audience through a unique advertising experience thanks to transparent, animated and interactive ads that come on top of native and web apps without stopping user navigation
one_liner: Animated mobile ads.

name: Permutive
long_description: As third-party identifiers like the cookie disappear, ad-tech breaks—targeting, frequency capping and measurement disappear. We're rebuilding data infrastructure in advertising to work with cohorts—privacy safe descriptions of users—which enable advertising use cases without the need for sharing personal identifiers. We do this by moving data processing and management out of the cloud, and on to the user's device.
one_liner: Rebuilding data in advertising to protect privacy

name: Makrwatch
long_description:
Makrwatch helps D2C companies scale user acquisition with YouTube creators. Our clients see us as an alternative growth channel to Google/Facebook, by reaching their audience at a more efficient cost per acquisition and obtaining high quality customers that are more engaged. 

Makrwatch has been growing 100%+ year over year, currently processes 2M-5M in billings and helps creators in over 60+ countries. We are reaching 20 team members in 6+ countries, have been fully remote for the past years and aim to reach 20M in billings with 10,000 sponsored videos within the next 18 months.
one_liner: Scale new user acquisition with YouTube Creators

name: Popular Pays
long_description: Popular Pays is a platform connecting content Creators with Brands who want content to tell their stories. We’re tech-forward, with an in-house built iOS and web app (for creators) and dashboard (for brands) that delivers direct communication & powerful statistics to help you run a multiplatform campaign. To find out what we’re about, visit our website: www.popularpays.com.
one_liner: Software for collaborating with content creators and influencers

name: Automate Ads
long_description: On a mission to automate, optimize, and unify your digital advertising campaigns with incredible software.
one_liner: On a mission to programmatically automate, optimize, and unify your…

name: CoinTent
long_description: Launched in 2013, CoinTent is a digital wallet and subscription service that enables users to purchase quality content, including articles, videos, blog posts, and more, for micropayments across websites. Its services provide a revenue channel for publishers, supplementing revenue sources such as advertising and subscriptions. CoinTent is based in San Francisco, California, United States.
one_liner: Recover revenue lost to ad blockers

name: Demeanor.co
one_liner: Now part of thentwrk.com

name: Grabb-It
long_description: Social network, email aggregator
one_liner: Grabb-It is a location based Dynamic Digital - OOH advertising…

name: Jupiter
one_liner: Using AI to help food creators verticalize food

name: Paneau
long_description: Paneau puts tablets inside Uber/Lyfts for businesses to advertise directly to the riders. Riders can interact and do anything from make purchases to re-route the car.
one_liner: Tablets inside Uber/Lyfts to advertise directly to riders

name: Taiv
long_description:
Taiv puts TVs on autopilot, automatically switching between cable, our own streaming channels, digital signage, and trivia.  Our proprietary AI model analyzes the live video feed and intelligently switches sources during commercial breaks, show changes, or based on the time of day, to show the best possible content & ads for any environment.

We offer this for free to venues and make money by selling ads, which we rev-share back with the venue, turning their TVs from a cost center to a profit center.
one_liner: Taiv uses AI to make businesses TVs more entertaining & valuable.

name: Buoyant Aero
long_description: Buoyant Aero builds zero-emissions autonomous drone blimps to break free from existing advertising paradigms and reach new audiences in new places. Whether it’s on the beach, outside the convention center, or through the window of your target executive’s office, Buoyant’s blimps amplify your message to create measurable brand benefits.
one_liner: Bringing back blimps

name: Plai
long_description: Plai is the AI advertising tool built for marketing teams and agencies. Thousands of advertisers are using Plai to create Facebook Ads, Google Ads, and TikTok Ads from a ChatGPT prompt. Plai automatically finds your target audience, generates your creative, and launches your ad campaigns like a pro in seconds, no experience required. Whether you need to acquire new leads for your startup, sales for your e-commerce store, or grow your brand, Plai is your super app for marketing.
one_liner: Run ads with AI

name: Reforged Labs
long_description: Reforged Labs Boa is the AI creative intelligence agent that answers all your questions about what ads are performing, why they work, and what to create next.
one_liner: Turn intuition into insights, in minutes

name: Vimmerse
long_description: Designers, branding agencies, and on-line stores can use Vimmerse’s AI creators platform, Apps, and API to animate their images at scale making their business stand out from the crowd.
one_liner: Bring your photos to life with Vimmerse

name: Kular
long_description:
Kular is an AI Lead Generator, generating leads for busy professionals and business owners and only charging for results. Today, Kular generates leads for over 1000 companies via email and LinkedIn. 

Kular is being built by a team of MIT, IIT, Cambridge and Oxford grads, backed by some of the best investors in the world, including Y-Combinator, Entrepreneur First, Acequia Capital and angel investors behind companies like Ironclad, OpenSea and Stripe.
one_liner: AI Lead Generator

name: CustomerOS
long_description:
CustomerOS uncovers high-fit leads who are engaging directly with your brand but not yet in your sales funnel. By lead scoring your pipeline against your ICP we build data-driven profiles of your best customers and provide a real-time ICP-fit indicator so your team doesn't waste time on low-value/high-cost leads. This ensures you're spending your CAC acquiring customers who are primed to renew year after year and expand as they grow.

The Top 10% of SaaS companies generate 87% of all market returns. CustomerOS gives you the data and tooling to compete with the top 10%.
one_liner: Uncover high-fit leads already silently engaging with your brand

name: 1stCollab
long_description:
1stCollab is the first influencer platform that fully automates and optimizes every aspect of your influencer marketing program. We’ve helped hundreds of startups launch their first campaigns and enabled larger brands to scale to thousands of influencers, while saving them over $1M annually in influencer spend.

What we offer:
- Smart search & recommendations – Instantly connect with thousands of relevant influencers.
- Full campaign automation – From outreach and negotiations to contracts, payments, and taxes, we handle it all.
- Real-time performance tracking – Monitor conversions, revenue, and run A/B tests with detailed reporting.
one_liner: Performance-Optimized Influencer Marketing at Scale

name: Kite
long_description:
Kite is a screen recorder that makes your demo videos look like Apple commercials in minutes.

Simply record your app (works for iPhone recordings too!). Kite will track your cursor and keyboard inputs, so it can automatically zoom in on the action with professional 3D animations.

Kite is as easy as Canva, but your videos will look like they came out of OpenAI or Figma.

- One-click cinematic 3D animations
- Display recordings on 3D mockup devices (MacBooks, iPhones etc)
- Combine unlimited recordings into one video
- Edit, adjust speed and trim recordings
- Add text scenes and text annotations alongside recordings
- AI voiceovers using state of the art text to speech models
- Free music library
- Brand kit–upload your logos, colors and fonts
- Start from our template library or start from scratch

Kite is used by hundreds of YC companies for launch videos, social media posts, landing page demos, changelog updates, feature releases and more.
one_liner: Screen recorder for stunning product demo videos

name: Surface Labs
long_description:
Surface Labs helps B2B companies capture, qualify, and convert inbound leads through intelligent contact forms. We replace tools like HubSpot Forms, Zapier, and Chili Piper with a single platform that embeds on any site with one line of code.

Our AI agents handle lead capture, enrichment, routing, follow-up, and CRO testing — automating what used to require full marketing ops teams. Customers see a 30% lift in conversions in under 2 weeks, and our partial response capture feature collects 50% more emails from form drop-offs.
one_liner: Building the AI-powered marketing ops platform that turns website…

name: Stewdio
long_description: Stewdio is a collaborative platform for creative teams to use all the latest image + video generation models in one place. Music video directors, ad agencies, and architects use Stewdio to create everything from rap videos for Quavo and Loco, advertising storyboards, to architectural renderings.
one_liner: All-in-one AI creative platform

name: Relixir
long_description:
Relixir is the autonomous GEO platform. We map, monitor, and continuously improve AI search rankings across ChatGPT, Perplexity, Google AIO, etc.

Customers include global marketing teams from 50+ fastest growing companies like Rippling, Airwallex, Retell AI, HackerRank, etc.
one_liner: The Autonomous GEO Platform

name: Kestroll
long_description:
Kestroll is an AI creative designer that produces realistic and on-brand assets for marketing teams.

Kestroll uses generative AI to create product photos and videos that feel authentic and consistent with the brand, allowing companies to localize, experiment, and scale marketing campaigns cheaply and effortlessly.

Instead of spending thousands on weekly photo or video shoots, hiring models, building sets for every local, or sifting through limited stock libraries, marketing teams can create everything they need from one centralized platform. 

Every asset reflects the real product and stays on-brand, eliminating tedious review cycles between design and campaign teams.
one_liner: Kestroll generates on-brand marketing assets at scale

name: Uplane
long_description:
Uplane uses AI to automate digital advertising. 

Uplane's AI platform creates 1000s of ad campaigns with matching landing pages for each one, and allocates budgets across Meta, Google, TikTok and more. By connecting to CRM and ERP data, Uplane learns what drives profit and continuously improves campaigns.

Companies waste billions on bad ads, mismatched landing pages, and poor budget allocation. Uplane fixes this by replacing a patchwork of agencies, spreadsheets, and siloed tools with one self-improving system. The result: 20-50% higher ROAS for enterprises and effortless, expert-level marketing for SMBs.

Digital marketing is a $740B market with a 10% CAGR. Our model compounds: we charge a base fee plus 10% of ad spend, outperforming marketing agencies that typically charge 10-30%.

Our team has deep founder-market fit: Julius managed a 7-digit monthly ad budget at one of the biggest ad spenders in Europe; Marvin has an academic background in Data Science (Imperial, Harvard) and led growth analytics & operations at a unicorn; Lukas was Head of Engineering at two YC startups, Blair (S19) and Fastgen (W23). Together, we’re building the platform we wished we had, and customers are already paying for it.
one_liner: AI autopilot for performance marketing.

name: Absurd
long_description:
Absurd (YC F25) makes absurd AI launch videos. The first launch video we made hit 450K+ views on X.

Making good AI videos is hard. You have to write a story that actually flows, pick the right models for motion, faces, and lighting, and then stitch it all together so it feels cinematic. Most people don’t realize how much craft that takes — so most AI ads end up looking like slop.

Absurd replaces that process with autonomous AI agents, guided by a team of creative directors, to create production-quality videos in 72 hours. These agents collaborate with your team on Slack to plan, script, and generate every scene on an interactive canvas. From the canvas, your team can watch shotlists, image frames, and video renders come to life in real time — commenting, iterating, or generating new ideas alongside the agents.

Try it today at tryabsurd.com
one_liner: Absurd AI Video Ads

name: Waffer
long_description: Video creation is stuck between uncontrollable AI generators and complex pro tools. Waffer lets you produce and direct animated graphics videos with the ease of a text prompt, while offering the same amount of control as Adobe After Effects.
one_liner: Lovable for Animated Graphics Videos

name: Claybird
long_description:
Claybird is an agent that plans, generates, and edits your AI video ad.

Marketers often rely on agencies to produce video ads - a slow, expensive process involving endless revisions, actors, and shoots.

Claybird is like Lovable for AI ads: it collaborates with marketers on creative direction, generates shots using Veo, Sora, and other top models, and intelligently edits them into a studio-quality video.

When most people try making AI content, it looks like “slop”. But Claybird Agent, like an expert director, understands quality: it knows which camera angle, shot type, and lighting is necessary for each scene.

Get started at claybird.com
one_liner: Claybird plans, creates, and edits your AI video ad.
